All Classes

Class Description
AdminFunctions
The Admin Home functions grouped in this class for simplicity and to keep other admin classes single-purpose only.
AdminHome
Admin home panel, has a tabbed pane with 3 tabs (one per table) Users with admin privileges are able to view and edit all objects in the database.
AdminRefresh
Refreshes the admin tables
AdminTables
Constructs the admin tables
AlreadyExists
Custom Exception for items that already exist
Asset
This class contains the fields and methods that are used by assets.
AssetPage
The asset page has been designed to host the graphical representation of the selected asset's price history.
CreateShell
Where the shell is created ready for content to be added.
CurrentOrders
The current orders page contains a tabbed pane with two tables, one showing the current BUY orders of the user's unit, and another showing their current SELL orders.
DatabaseSource
The interface class used to interact with the database specified by the client.
DBConnection
Taken from CAB302 prac 7 and modified to make it easier for setup of the application with a different server
DoesNotExist
Custom Exception for items that do not exist
EstablishConnection
Establishes the connection between the client and server
Gui
Begins creation of the entire GUI invoked by Main.
HashPassword
Security class, has the purpose of creating salt strings and hashing passwords Used for hashing new passwords (with new salt), changing passwords (re-hashing with existing salt), and logging in (hashing input password then comparing with database password).
IllegalString
Custom Exception for parameters (strings) that are invalid inputs
InvalidAmount
Custom Exception for parameters (integers) that are invalid inputs
InvalidDate
Custom Exception for parameters (dates) that are invalid inputs
InvalidPrice
Custom Exception for parameters (prices) that are invalid inputs
LoginPage
The login portal
Main
STONK MACHINE - An intuitive and responsive trading app.
MockObjects
Mock database used for testing only
NetworkConnection
The core SQL commands to construct the database and where the DatabaseSource interface methods are defined.
NotAuthorised
Custom Exception for trying to access methods without the right access
Order
Organises orders
OrderException
Custom Exception for orders that are illegal
OrderFailedPage
Insightful warning to the user that their order has failed
OrderHistory
The order history page contains a tabbed pane with two tables, one showing the past BUY orders of the user's unit, and another showing their past SELL orders.
OrderPlacedPage
The orders placed message page
OrdersPage
The orders page
ReconcileTrades
Reconciles orders live behind the scenes
Shell
The shell where only the content panel changes
TestAsset
The following tests are used to test the functionality of the Assets class.
TestHashPassword
The following tests are used to test the functionality of the HashPassword class.
TestNetworkConnection
The following tests are used to test the functionality and reliability of the Network Connection class.
TestOrders
The following tests are used to test the functionality of the Orders class.
TestUnit
The following tests are used to test the functionality of the Unit class.
TestUser
The following tests are used to test the functionality of the User class.
Unit
This class contains the fields and methods that are used by units.
User
Create user instances with the data encapsulated within an instance
UserHome
The user home page contains a table showing the assets currently held by the user's unit, their quantities and current average buy order price.
